job_history.work_description: Provide guidance and direction to a team of Licensed Life and Disability Benefit Advocates. Present and promote Benefit Advocate services to both internal and external prospects. Assist Consultants and Client HR with advanced needs, sensitive and escalated issues. Provide guidance and assistance on insurance questions, client relations, carrier issues, guidelines, technical support and more.

Coach and provide guidance to 14 Licensed Property & Casualty Customer Service Agents. Coordinate daily operations, manage schedule and attendance adherence. Support training and reinforce process recommendations aimed at developing a high performance team with an emphasis on account management and sales support.

Assist department supervisors with the coaching, training and mentoring of Customer Service Agents. Monitor department productivity, take escalated calls, answer questions and provide assistance to co-workers.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in supervisory and leadership roles, guiding teams of customer service agents and benefit advocates, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has successfully managed teams of up to 14 agents, demonstrating strong leadership and management skills, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Coaching and Mentoring
skills.explanation: Has provided guidance and assistance to team members, helping them develop their skills and performance, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in customer-facing roles, handling escalated calls and providing assistance to customers, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Account Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in account management and sales support, but the extent of this experience is not clearly defined, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has presented and promoted services to internal and external prospects, and has provided guidance and assistance on various topics, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has handled sensitive and escalated issues, and has provided assistance on complex topics, suggesting strong proficiency in problem-solving.
